preface.title: Preface
preface.para: This documentation consists of six sections: The first section is the introduction containing an installation guide that introduces the graphical configurator interface and the optimization viewer. The second section outlines the structure of OPT4J . A tutorial for the implementation of three problems (Hello World, Traveling Salesman, and MinOnes) and one optimizer (MutateOptimizer) are given in the following four sections. The last section shows how OPT4J can be started from command line for testcases or integrated into third party software.
